messageBody:
assertTrue?

David Saff

On Wed, May 13, 2009 at 9:05 AM, Martijn Dashorst
<martijn.dashorst@...> wrote:
> I just discovered that the hamcrest like API misses a nice method to
> assert the true-ness of boolean methods.
>
> Writing:
>
> assertThat(list.isEmpty(), is(true));
>
> feels less natural than:
>
> assertThat(list.isEmpty());
>
> or
>
> assertThat(list, isEmpty());
>
> Or am I overlooking some API?
>
> Martijn
